meaningMnemonic: If you have <radical>fingers</radical> it's <radical>easy</radical> to <kanji>hoist</kanji> things above your head. If you don't have fingers, well, it's not so easy.
readingMnemonic: Today, you have to <kanji>hoist</kanji> so much stuff. "<reading>Ah</reading>!" (あ) you say, "So much hoisting to do." Better get to it!
